attributes.action: Allow women to have IVF free of charge on NHS
attributes.additional_details: Not allowing or charging too much for IVF is very unfair. Every woman should have the chance of having a family it's not fair for a female to get charged for trying for a baby
attributes.background: Allow women to have IVF treatment free on NHS to give them a chance of having a family

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556941
